con:testCase.name: Fisk Payment-BlockedAccount
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create File payment for FISK with BLOCKED account and payment cannot be processed. status wil move REJC Disabling the testcase as its invalid scenario

con:config.con:query: SELECT distinct(CUSTOMERID), ACCOUNTNUMBER, CURRENCY FROM V_AUTHORISATION WHERE ROLETYPE = 'EIER' and CUSTBANKID='${#TestSuite#bankId}' and CURRENCY = 'NOK' and BLOCKEDFORDEBIT = 'Y' and length(customerID)='11' fetch first 2 row only

SELECT T.TRANSACTIONSID,M.MESSAGEID,P.PAYMENTINFOID,T.PAYMENTSTATUS,T.FK_PROCESSINGLINEID,T.RELEASEDATE,T.ISPC, I.INSTRUCTIONID,I.ADDITIONALINFO, I.INSTRUCTIONFUNCTION, I.INSTRUCTIONTYPE, I.INSTRUCTIONFIELD FROM message M , paymentinfo P , TRANSACTIONS T ,INSTRUCTIONS I where M.messageid = P.fk_messageid and P.paymentinfoid = T.fk_paymentinfoid and T.TRANSACTIONSID = I.FK_TRANSACTIONSID and M.messageidentification like '%${Properties#MsgId}%'

select * from STATUSREASON S, STATUSREASON_ADDT_INF SA where S.STATUSREASONID = SA.FK_STATUSREASONID and (S.FK_TRANSACTIONID = '${FetchTransaction#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}' OR S.FK_PAYMENTINFOID = '${FetchTransaction#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/PAYMENTINFOID[1]}' OR FK_MESSAGEID = '${FetchTransaction#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/MESSAGEID[1]}' )

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Only transfers in NOK can be used for payments having advanced credit reservations

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: 169115 CURR PAIN 349834 83896 169115 Only transfers in NOK can be used for payments having advanced credit reservations
